content.contents: i don't know, i'm just tired
when you put your heart and soul into something and it gets no recognition
or you open up your project file, the only 'work-in-progress' you have going, and you see how much stupid, pointless work you have to do
is it pointless? sometimes it feels great, other times you get no recognition
i can't rely on recognition as motivation, that's just the worst idea. if you keep that kind of thing up you'll just end up driving yourself insane.
i would like to think i do my music for me. but i do wish for some semblance of a 'fanbase', which, i know i do have, but
i don't know. why do i crave love? i suppose otherwise it feels as though i'm shouting into the void. can i really be ungrateful? my art has been growing, but
i just, don't want to hit a ceiling
